div.p: (a) Chiral HPLC traces of P5A-DPA, (b), (c) the first and second fractions of P5A-DPA, detected by UV at 295 nm. Conditions: column, DAICEL CHIRALPAK IA; mobile phase: hexane/dichloromethane 35:65; flow rate = 4.0 mL/min; temperature 25 °C). (d) CD and (e) UV–vis spectra of racemic P5A-DPA, the first and second fractions (10 μM) in CHCl 3 at 25 °C.
